text: Customer expectations are changing every day,
so how can contact centers better manage their people
and operations to keep up?
Using Amazon Connect
and AI-powered real-time analytics
empower your teams to proactively address customer issues,
assess agent performance
and forecast contact volume to optimize agent schedules.
These capabilities help you measure, track,
and improve contact center operations.
You can increase customer satisfaction and reduce the time
agents and supervisors spend reviewing notes
with conversational analytics
and generative AI that summarizes conversations
to better understand sentiment, track emerging themes,
and discover compliance risks.
Improve agent performance
by analyzing aggregated metrics across cohorts of agents
and automatically populating evaluations
based on customer interactions.
(upbeat music)
Avoid over or understaffing, which can lead to higher costs
or customer frustration by predicting contact volumes
with high accuracy to better determine staffing levels
and optimize agent schedules.
These capabilities are built directly into Amazon Connect,
so you can quickly deploy analytics, manage performance,
and optimize your workforce without the added costs
of complex integrations.
Monitor and improve your contact center operations
with Amazon Connect.
(upbeat music)
